comment: IMO That's what the Monks who created it were familiar with during that period as they were Anglo-Saxons, so it makes sense they'd that interpret the scene based on what surrounded them everyday. I doubt many of the Monks at Lindesfarne had ever been to the Middle East or knew much about the ship types & clothing styles in use there.
